name: WIP QC Report
query:
select
q.name as "QI No.:Link/Quality Inspection:150",
q.company as "Plant:Data:150",
q.report_date as "Date:Date:80",
q.shift as "Shift",
q.item_code as "FG Code",
q.item_name as "FG Item Name",
q.batch_no as "Batch No.",
q.verified_by as "Verified By",
q.line_no as "Line no",
q.quality_inspection_template as "Quality Inspection Template",
r.specification as "Parameter",
r.acceptance_criteria as "Specification",
r.reading_1 as "Reading 1",
r.reading_2 as "Reading 2",
r.reading_3 as "Reading 3",
r.reading_4 as "Reading 4"
from `tabQuality Inspection` q, `tabQuality Inspection Reading Template WIP` r
where q.name = r.parent and inspection_for_wip = 1 and q.company=%(company)s and q.report_date between %(from)s and %(to)s
order by q.item_name;
